name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Sales Engineer with 8 years of experience in developing and integrating high-performance solutions, specializing in API development, RESTful services, and data formats like JSON and XML. Skilled in authentication protocols such as OAuth and adept in integrating SaaS applications within healthcare and financial sectors. My technical expertise encompasses a broad **tech stack** including **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **Flutter**, coupled with substantial experience in **AWS** and **Azure** cloud environments.

I possess strong communication and collaboration skills, ensuring seamless integration of complex systems and thorough technical documentation. My problem-solving abilities are reinforced by a robust understanding of microservices architecture and event-driven systems, enabling me to deliver effective CRM solutions for diverse clients. Proven track record in leveraging AI/ML capabilities for enhanced analytics and intelligent automation, aligned with compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
